trans-unit.source: Represents a security token that is based upon an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Representa un token de seguridad que se basa en un certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: To get the details of the X.509 certificate, access the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener los detalles del certificado X.509, consulte la propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que contiene el certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia nueva de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> con el certificado X.509 especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a unique identifier for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token and assigns that value to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor genera un identificador único para el token de seguridad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> y asigna ese valor a la propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que contiene el certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: Identificador único del token de seguridad.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate and unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia nueva de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> con el certificado X.509 especificado y un identificador único.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> es null.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> que especifica el identificador de clave que se va a crear.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this security token is capable of creating the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si este token de seguridad es capaz de crear el identificador de clave especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when <paramref name="T" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" />, or <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> cuando <paramref name="T" /> es del tipo <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" /> o <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for an X.509 certificate can be expressed using many different key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: El identificador de clave para un certificado X.509 se puede expresar utilizando muchas cláusulas diferentes de identificador de clave.

trans-unit.source: These key identifier clauses are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> classes.
trans-unit.target: Las clases <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause> y <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> representan estas cláusulas de identificador de clave.

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el certificado X.509 asociado al token de seguridad.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que contiene el certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property to get the details about the X.509 certificate associated with the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> para obtener los detalles del certificado X.509 asociado al token de seguridad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.

trans-unit.source: For instance, the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate can be accessed using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Thumbprint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, se puede obtener acceso a la huella digital del certificado X.509 utilizando la propiedad <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Thumbprint%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> que especifica el identificador de clave que se va a crear.

trans-unit.source: Creates the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: Crea la cláusula de identificador de clave especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that is a key identifier clause for the security token.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> que es una cláusula de identificador de clave para el token de seguridad.

trans-unit.source: The return value for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method is one of the key identifier clause types that an X.509 certificate key identifier can be expressed in.
trans-unit.target: El valor devuelto para el método <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> es uno de los tipos de cláusula de identificador de clave en que se puede expresar un identificador de clave del certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: The possible return types are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> classes.
trans-unit.target: Los posibles tipos devueltos se representan mediante las clases <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause> y <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos que usa <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: Llame al método <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> cuando termine de utilizar el <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> deja el <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> en un estado no utilizable.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar al método <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A>, debe liberar todas las referencias a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> para que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> ocupaba.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: Realice siempre una llamada a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar la última referencia al objeto <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, los recursos que está usando no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llame al método <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> del objeto `Finalize`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un identificador único del token de seguridad.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: Identificador único del token de seguridad.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the key identifier for this instance is equal to the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor que indica si el identificador de clave para esta instancia es igual al identificador de clave especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> is one of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" />, or <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" /> types and the key identifier clauses match; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> es uno de los tipos <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" /> o <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" /> y las cláusulas de identificador de clave coinciden; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method matches criteria in the X.509 certificate in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property based on the type of the `keyIdentifierClause` parameter.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A> coincide con criterios del certificado X.509 en la propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> basada en el tipo del parámetro `keyIdentifierClause`.

trans-unit.source: The following table details what is matched.
trans-unit.target: La tabla siguiente detalla en qué se coincide.

trans-unit.source: Key identifier clause type
trans-unit.target: Tipo de cláusula de identificador de clave

trans-unit.source: What is matched
trans-unit.target: En qué se coincide

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A> property and the issuer serial number returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la propiedad <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A> y el número de serie del emisor que devuelve el método <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The data returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetRawCertData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Datos que devuelve el método <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetRawCertData%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The subject key identifier extension in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A> property is matched.
trans-unit.target: Se encuentra una coincidencia con la extensión del identificador de clave de sujeto de la propiedad <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The thumbprint that is returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Huella digital que devuelve el método <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene las claves criptográficas asociadas al token de seguridad.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> de tipo <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> que contiene el conjunto de claves asociadas al token de seguridad.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A> property to set the cryptographic keys for this security token to protect a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A> para establecer las claves criptográficas para que este token de seguridad proteja un mensaje SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The keys can be used, among other things, to digitally sign or encrypt SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: Entre otras cosas, las claves se pueden usar para firmar o cifrar digitalmente los mensajes SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> method has been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicia una excepción si se ha llamado al método <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> para esta instancia.

trans-unit.source: the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> method has been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: se ha llamado al método <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> para esta instancia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene a tiempo el primer momento en el que este token de seguridad es válido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the instant in time at which this security token is first valid.
trans-unit.target: Valor de tipo <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que representa el primer momento en el que este token de seguridad es válido por primera vez.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is specified in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and is the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotBefore%2A> property of the X.509 certificate specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> se especifica en hora universal coordinada (hora UTC) y es el valor de la propiedad <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotBefore%2A> del certificado X.509 especificado en la propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene a tiempo el último momento en el que este token de seguridad es válido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que representa el último momento en el tiempo en el que este token de seguridad es válido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is specified in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and is the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotAfter%2A> property of the X.509 certificate specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> se especifica en hora universal coordinada (hora UTC) y es el valor de la propiedad <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotAfter%2A> del certificado X.509 especificado en la propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A>.
